page.title: 02MANOR FARM LITTLE PLUMSTEAD
page.content: We visited two farms in our area.The first was called Manor Farm in Little Plumstead,it was on a private road. The{farm}belonged to J.R.Couzens Wiley LTD.The farmer had 980 acres of land with 3 different types of soil,grades 1,2 and 3.They had{crops}and{animals ,the animals were a beef herd of 30 cows.The crops grown were wheat,barley ,sugar beet,oil seed rape,peas,beans, potatoes,apples and black currants. They work from 7.30A.M. to 4P.M.In the summer he feeds the cows grass and in the winter they eat silage,barley and pulp nuts.He sells his animals and their products at Norwich{market}and he grows some of his own food.He buys his animals in Wales and he harvests his crops with machines between July and December.He has some machinery of his own,but most he has on contract. His employees help him.
